Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.bugsnag.android.Bugsnag.notify(String, String, StackTraceElement[], Severity, MetaData)
    Use Bugsnag.notify(String,String,StackTraceElement[],Callback) to send and modify error reports
    com.bugsnag.android.Client.notify(String, String, StackTraceElement[], Severity, MetaData)
    Use Client.notify(String,String,StackTraceElement[],Callback) to send and modify error reports
    com.bugsnag.android.Bugsnag.notify(String, String, String, StackTraceElement[], Severity, MetaData)
    Use Bugsnag.notify(String,String,StackTraceElement[],Callback) to send and modify error reports
    com.bugsnag.android.Client.notify(String, String, String, StackTraceElement[], Severity, MetaData)
    Use Client.notify(String,String,StackTraceElement[],Callback) to send and modify error reports
    com.bugsnag.android.Bugsnag.notify(Throwable, MetaData)
    Use Bugsnag.notify(Throwable,Callback) to send and modify error reports
    com.bugsnag.android.Client.notify(Throwable, MetaData)
    Use Client.notify(Throwable,Callback) to send and modify error reports
    com.bugsnag.android.Bugsnag.notify(Throwable, Severity, MetaData)
    Use Bugsnag.notify(Throwable,Callback) to send and modify error reports
    com.bugsnag.android.Client.notify(Throwable, Severity, MetaData)
    Use Client.notify(Throwable,Callback) to send and modify error reports
    com.bugsnag.android.Client.notifyBlocking(String, String, StackTraceElement[], Severity, MetaData)
    Use Client.notifyBlocking(String,String,StackTraceElement[],Callback) to send and modify error reports
    com.bugsnag.android.Client.notifyBlocking(String, String, String, StackTraceElement[], Severity, MetaData)
    Use Client.notifyBlocking(String,String,StackTraceElement[],Callback) to send and modify error reports
    com.bugsnag.android.Client.notifyBlocking(Throwable, MetaData)
    Use Client.notify(Throwable,Callback) to send and modify error reports
    com.bugsnag.android.Client.notifyBlocking(Throwable, Severity, MetaData)
    Use Client.notifyBlocking(Throwable,Callback) to send and modify error reports
    com.bugsnag.android.Bugsnag.setEndpoint(String)
    use Configuration.setEndpoint(String) instead.
